Original meaning 本义: Meaning kill.

剹字的基本解释

剹
lù
古同“戮”。
削。

剹
jiū
〔剹流〕形容曲折迂回的水流，如“涉长路之绵绵兮，远纡回以剹剹。”亦作“樛流”，缭绕之意。

剹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《廣韻》力竹切，入屋，來。］
同“戮1”。
[②]［jiū］
［《集韻》居尤切，平尤，見。］
见“剹2流”。

剹字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剹； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页143第21
【唐韻】【集韻】?力竹切，音六。【玉篇】削也。【廣韻】同戮。又【集韻】居尤切，音樛。剹流，回轉貌。

剹字的起名意思

暂无。

Cut
Basic explanation of words
Cut
lù
Gu Tong "slaughtered".
cut.
Cut
jiū
〔剹流〕describes the tortuous currents, such as "the long road is stretched, and the long distance is back to be slapped." It is also used as "樛流", which means winding.
Cut
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lù］
["Guang Yun" Li Zhu cut, enter the house, come. ]
Same as "Lan 1".
[②]［jiū］
["Ji Yun" Ju Youqie, Ping You, see you. ]
See "Single 2 Stream".
Cut
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　剹; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 143-21
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Li Zhu cut, sound six. [Jade articles] Cut too. [Guang Yun] The same slaughter. Also 【Jiyun】Juyouqie, Yinxun. Streaming, turning around.
